sections.heading: Closing of offices and courts; transaction of certain judicial business1-302
sections.text: Closing of offices and courts; transaction of certain judicial businessA. Public offices shall not be open, and no court of justice shall be open or any judicial business transacted on a legal holiday, except for the follow
